metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2953 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in openldap. This security flaw causes a null pointer dereference in ber_memalloc_x() function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm6
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm6
slapd - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm6
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: openldap package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm6').
